newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech blue chips rally, RPIX index up 2.32pct.
newsitem.headline: Czech blue chips rally, RPIX index up 2.32pct.

text.p: 1215 GMT - Czech bourse's most widely-held shares post strong gains in continuous trading session. * RPIX index rises 24.3 points, or 2.32 percent, to close at 1,069.8. * Komercni Banka announced approval for its plan to convert an additional three percent of shares into global depositary receipts. The stock was up 106 crowns, most of the gains coming before the announcement, to close at 1,854. * SPT Telecom rose 100 crowns to 3,710. * Of the RPIX index of all 11 continuously traded shares, 10 posted gains, while fund SPIF Cesky lost one crown to 351. * Turnover was 19.5 million crowns on the session. -- Jan Lopatka, Prague Newsroom, 420-2-2423-0003
